Reads fastq, looks at content. can write output fastq.gz

# Setup

```{r}
library(ShortRead)
```

```{r}
source(file.path("scripts", "paths.R"))
```

# Read 1

```{r}
R1 <- readFastq(R1_path_OM14)
```



```{r}
sread(R1)[1:10]
```

```{r}
sread(R1)[11:20]
```

```{r}
sread(R1)[21:30]
```


```{r}
sread(R1)
```

^some of the forward reads match barcodes
